subject: Officiating (Sports)
Hispanic-Americans
Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. calls Riveron a trailblazer, although Hispanics, the nation’s largest ethnic minority, go back a long way in professional football.
snippet: The N.F.L. calls Riveron a trailblazer, although Hispanics, the nation’s largest ethnic minority, go back a long way in professional football.
